```{r, setup}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(ggplot2)
  library(data.table)
  library(infotheo)
  library(scMET)
  library(knitr)
})
```

```{r}
samples <- snakemake@params[["samples"]]
N <- snakemake@params[["N"]]
f <- snakemake@params[["f"]]
data_dir <- dirname(snakemake@input[["det_out"]])
intervals <- read.table(
  paste0(data_dir, paste("/intervals", N, f, "tsv", sep = ".")), ,
  col.names = c("chr2", "start2", "end2", "het", "snip_pos"),
  header = F
)
sampens <- read.table(
  snakemake@input[["det_out"]],
  header = T
)
jnt <- cbind(sampens, intervals)
output_cols <- grep("^output", colnames(jnt), value = TRUE)
jnt.long <- do.call(rbind, lapply(output_cols, function(col) {
  data.frame(
    start = jnt$start,
    end = jnt$end,
    sample = col,
    sampen = jnt[[col]],
    shannon = jnt$shannon,
    avg_meth = jnt$avg_meth,
    het = jnt$het
  )
}))


meth <- read.table(
  paste0(data_dir, paste("/yamet", samples, N, f, "meth.out", sep = ".")),
  header = TRUE
)
meth.long <- do.call(rbind, lapply(output_cols, function(col) {
  data.frame(
    meth = meth[[col]]
  )
}))

all.long <- cbind(jnt.long, meth.long)

ggplot(all.long, aes(x = meth, y = sampen, color = het)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Sample Entropy in different het values",
    x = "Average Methylation", y = "Sample Entropy", color = "het"
  )

ggplot(all.long, aes(x = as.factor(het), y = sampen)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, position = position_jitter(width = 0.2)) +
  geom_violin(alpha = 0.3, position = position_dodge(0.8)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Sample Entropy in different het values",
    x = "het", y = "Sample Entropy"
  ) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1))

ggplot(jnt, aes(x = avg_meth, y = shannon, color = het)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Shannon Entropy in different het values (per cell)",
    x = "Average Methylation", y = "Shannon Entropy", color = "het"
  )

ggplot(jnt, aes(x = het, y = shannon, color = avg_meth)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Shannon Entropy in different het values (per cell)",
    x = "het", y = "Shannon Entropy", color = "meth"
  )

ggplot(all.long, aes(x = shannon, y = sampen, color = het)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Sample Entropy in different het values",
    x = "Shannon Entropy", y = "Sample Entropy", color = "het"
  )
```

```{r}
all.long <- as.data.table(all.long)
scmet_Y <- all.long[, .(
  Feature = paste0(start, ":", end),
  Cell = sample,
  total_reads = end - start,
  met_reads = round(meth * (end - start))
)]
scmet_fit <- suppressWarnings(
  scmet(Y = scmet_Y, L = 4, iter = 2000, n_cores = snakemake@threads, seed = 42)
)
scmet_fit$posterior$epsilon_avg <- colMeans(scmet_fit$posterior$epsilon)
scmet_fit$posterior$gamma_avg <- colMeans(scmet_fit$posterior$gamma)
```

```{r}
scmet_plot_mean_var(
  obj = scmet_fit, y = "gamma",
  task = NULL, show_fit = TRUE
)
scmet_plot_mean_var(
  obj = scmet_fit, y = "epsilon",
  task = NULL, show_fit = TRUE
)
```

```{r}
jnt$sampen_avg <- rowMeans(jnt[, output_cols])
mi_sampen <- mutinformation(discretize(jnt$sampen_avg), jnt$het) /
  sqrt(entropy(discretize(jnt$sampen_avg)) * entropy(jnt$het))
mi_shannon <- mutinformation(discretize(jnt$shannon), jnt$het) /
  sqrt(entropy(discretize(jnt$shannon)) * entropy(jnt$het))
mi_gamma <- mutinformation(discretize(scmet_fit$posterior$gamma_avg), jnt$het) /
  sqrt(entropy(discretize(scmet_fit$posterior$gamma_avg)) * entropy(jnt$het))
mi_epsilon <- mutinformation(discretize(scmet_fit$posterior$epsilon_avg), jnt$het) /
  sqrt(entropy(discretize(scmet_fit$posterior$epsilon_avg)) * entropy(jnt$het))

mi_results <- data.frame(
  Metric = c("Sample Entropy", "Shannon Entropy", "scMET (gamma)", "scMET (epsilon)"),
  `Normalised Mutual Information` = c(mi_sampen, mi_shannon, mi_gamma, mi_epsilon),
  check.names = FALSE
)

kable(mi_results,
  caption = "Normalized Mutual Information with True Heterogeneity Index",
  digits = 4,
  align = c("l", "r")
)
```
